text: Thomas Kenneth Prebble (November 1945 â€“ 17 January 2021) was a New Zealand educationalist and university administrator. He was born in Wellington, New Zealand. In the 2019 New Zealand Honours, Prebble was appointed a Member of the New Zealand Order of Merit. Prebble died on 17 January 2021 in Palmerston North, New Zealand aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:New Zealand academics Category:People from Wellington
title: Tom Prebble
